channel.title: docker on naveen srinivasan
channel.description: Recent content in docker on naveen srinivasan

item.title: My Docker aliases
item.description: I have been using docker very often now and because I have been spending most of time in the terminal it made sense to use alias to reduce the typing. [gist id = “d6b41d000b93f3ecc3e7a1b900c7382c”] I have curated this from others and have also customized to what I want. All my aliases are stored in my github repo https://github.com/naveensrinivasan/dotvim/blob/master/zshrc

item.title: fsharp docker image
item.description: The fsharp project has a official docker image https://github.com/fsprojects/docker-fsharp . The one issue with that is it is based on mono 4.0.4 which is buggy and fsharp does not work very well. The latest alpha release of the mono with which fsharp works well is 4.2.0. The 4.2.0 isn’t available in stable channels. So I created a docker image with the latest mono from their alpha repo and using the latest fsharp from the github.
